column4: hi. i installed ubuntu 8.10 with the net installer on my aspire one, but i chose "gnome portable" and not gnome desktop. how can i get a normal gnome desktop? i installed ubuntu-desktop and gnome-desktop-environment, but still nothing..
clean install it again, if you dont have important data on it already
ya I hear Ive been here waiting for an answer, and Im not getting nuttin, so sorry for the flip answer lol
